def pop_shift(strn):
    s2=''.join(strn[-i-1] for i in range(len(strn)//2))
    s1=''.join(strn[i]    for i in range(len(strn)//2))
    s0=''.join(strn[len(s1):-len(s1)])
    if len(strn)==1:
        s0=strn
    return [s2,s1,s0]

def pop_shift(input):
    input = list(input)
    x, y = list(), list()
    while len(input) > 1: 
        x.append(input.pop())
        y.append(input.pop(0))
    return [''.join(x), ''.join(y), ''.join(input)]
